0.9.2.name: wordpress/no-duplicate-comments
0.9.2.description:
Deprecated Prevent visitors from leaving duplicate comments/pingbacks/trackbacks to a post.

NOTE: This plugin is no longer necessary as of WordPress 2.0 as the issue has been fixed in WordPress. Simultaneous to the plugin's release, I submitted the problem the plugin addressed as a bug, in trac ticket #1262, which was then fixed in changeset #2561
